title: Huge precision errors in ppc64le tests
body_html:
At least these tests fail randomly due to a huge precision error (approximately 1 fail every 100 executions):

test_Conv1d:

FAIL: test_Conv1d (__main__.TestNN)
----------------------------------------------------------------------
Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "test/test_nn.py", line 2330, in <lambda>
    setattr(TestNN, test_name, lambda self, test=test: test(self))
  File "/home/brosa/pytorch/test/common_nn.py", line 571, in __call__
    self._do_test(test_case, module, input)
  File "test/test_nn.py", line 69, in _do_test
    test_case.check_jacobian(module, input, self.jacobian_input)
  File "/home/brosa/pytorch/test/common_nn.py", line 459, in check_jacobian
    PRECISION
AssertionError: 597828.9410372106 not less than or equal to 1e-05

test_Conv2d_groups_thnn:

FAIL: test_Conv2d_groups_thnn (__main__.TestNN)
----------------------------------------------------------------------
Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "test/test_nn.py", line 2330, in <lambda>
    setattr(TestNN, test_name, lambda self, test=test: test(self))
  File "/home/brosa/pytorch/test/common_nn.py", line 571, in __call__
    self._do_test(test_case, module, input)
  File "test/test_nn.py", line 69, in _do_test
    test_case.check_jacobian(module, input, self.jacobian_input)
  File "/home/brosa/pytorch/test/common_nn.py", line 459, in check_jacobian
    PRECISION
AssertionError: 512396.96441206516 not less than or equal to 1e-05

test_Conv2d_padding:

FAIL: test_Conv2d_padding (__main__.TestNN)
----------------------------------------------------------------------
Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "test_nn.py", line 2330, in <lambda>
    setattr(TestNN, test_name, lambda self, test=test: test(self))
  File "/home/brosa/pytorch/test/common_nn.py", line 571, in __call__
    self._do_test(test_case, module, input)
  File "test_nn.py", line 69, in _do_test
    test_case.check_jacobian(module, input, self.jacobian_input)
  File "/home/brosa/pytorch/test/common_nn.py", line 459, in check_jacobian
    PRECISION
AssertionError: 1149022.966940353 not less than or equal to 1e-05

Summary list of failing NN tests with similat outputs:

FAIL: test_Conv1d_groups (__main__.TestNN)
FAIL: test_Conv1d (__main__.TestNN)
FAIL: test_Conv1d_pad1 (__main__.TestNN)
FAIL: test_Conv1d_pad2 (__main__.TestNN)
FAIL: test_Conv1d_stride (__main__.TestNN)
FAIL: test_Conv2d_groups (__main__.TestNN)
FAIL: test_Conv2d_groups_thnn (__main__.TestNN)
FAIL: test_Conv2d (__main__.TestNN)
FAIL: test_Conv2d_no_bias (__main__.TestNN)
FAIL: test_Conv2d_padding (__main__.TestNN)
FAIL: test_Conv2d_strided (__main__.TestNN)

I'll update the issue if/when I find more failing tests.

body:
At least these tests fail randomly due to a huge precision error (approximately 1 fail every 100 executions):

`test_Conv1d`:
```
FAIL: test_Conv1d (__main__.TestNN)
----------------------------------------------------------------------
```
